bibl.title: Athenaeus in His Egyptian Context.
bibl.note: The picture of Egypt that we get from Athenaeus' work, and the Deipnosophistae as a source for Ptolemaic history.

bibl.title: Athenaeus and His World. Reading Greek Culture in the Roman Empire

bibl.seg: THOMPSON Dorothy J., Athenaeus in His Egyptian Context.
David BRAUND and John WILKINS (Edd.), Athenaeus and His World. Reading Greek Culture in the Roman Empire (Exeter, 2000) pp. 77-84; - 544-545.
The picture of Egypt that we get from Athenaeus' work, and the Deipnosophistae as a source for Ptolemaic history.
